definition[0]: an intermediate class, course etc is at a level of knowledge or skill that is between the basic level and the advanced level
example[0]: a book aimed at students at the intermediate level and above
definition[1]: intermediate students, sports players etc have reached a level of knowledge or skill that is between the basic level and the advanced level
definition[2]: an intermediate stage in a process of development is between two other stages
example[2]: an intermediate stage during which the disease is dormant
definition[3]: a student, sports player etc who has reached a level of knowledge or skill that is between the basic level and the advanced level
example[3]: a ski resort suited to beginners and intermediates
